name: @pointotech/react-native-combobox
title: React Native Combobox
description: Drop-down UI component that lets users select an item from a list.
keywords: react-native drop-down combobox combo-box spinner picker select options

comments.react-native: React Native versions preceding 0.60.0 require manual linking of native code. We aren't interested in supporting that functionality, or the documentation for it.
